text: Pierbattista Pizzaballa (born 21 April 1965) is an Italian Catholic prelate who has been the Latin Patriarch of Jerusalem since 6 November 2020. He was made a cardinal by Pope Francis in 2023. After Francis' death, he has been considered papabile at the 2025 papal conclave. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1965 births Category:Cardinals of the Roman Catholic Church Category:Italian Roman Catholic priests
title: Pierbattista Pizzaballa
